value:
Your white robe is too cool! But I'd
expect nothing less from the tactician
of the Order of Heroes. Say, can we...$k$pSwap robes? Just for a moment?!

I have no memories of my previous
world. All I remember is my name,
and a little bit about my mother...$k$pBut, I'm sure I'll remember everything
else soon enough!

Out on patrol? Thanks for working so
hard! Sometimes just walking around
like that can inspire a new strategy.$k$pHave you ever come up with some
amazing new technique while out on
patrol?

You come from another world just like
me, right? I feel better knowing our
situations are similar.$k$pLet's learn about this kingdom
together.

I was just exploring outside the castle.
The geography of this world is just so
new, and so exciting!$k$pAnd being near the ruins made me
feel like I just might...remember
something...

You're $Nu,
right? I've come with a great big hello
from $Nf!

Whew... I'm catching up quick as
I can, Mother!

That's a big step closer to
achieving my dream!

Hrm... Gotta say, that's kind of a
letdown.

This is just like that time I got a
new tactics book from my mother!

My name's Morgan—son of the
genius tactician Robin! Hmm... But
is my mother around here?

Oh, so I guess you spotted me! I was
watching you from over there, but I
didn't think you'd notice...$k$pBut I shouldn't be surprised. I expect
nothing less from the second
smartest tactician I know!$k$pThe smartest tactician I know is my
own mother, of course. But you could
be her rival for sure!$k$pThat's why I've been looking for an
opportunity to ask to be your
apprentice.$k$pOh, wait! I just let my own plan slip!
No way you'd ever take me on as
your apprentice now...$k$pHuh? You will? Really?! Oh, thank
you! You're amazing! And every bit
as kind as my mother.$k$pI'm so excited I get to learn all about
tactics from you. Now that it's official,
I'll stick to your side like glue!$k$pBecause no matter what happens, I'll
believe in you right up to the end!
はいっ！
Here I go!
うあっ！
N-no...
Checkmate!
Amateur.
Just as I planned!
You won't win like that!
Bad move...
Heehee
My mother is the greatest tactician who's ever lived, you know.
I've learned a lot watching your tactical style.
Would it be OK for me to browse through the Order's library?
Heh. I dug a pitfall nearby—don't tell anyone!
Huh? How'd I wind up with two copies of this strategy book?
Someday, I hope to be a strategist to rival my mother...
I'm glad to be able to help out, even if I've got a lot to learn.
OK!
Hmmm...
What's the plan?
